title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 11, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 11, 2022
description:
Adam and Mark link up to discuss a potential case involving superstar musician Drake and review SCOTUS' handling of the vaccine mandate questions they are facing.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
